thread.title: Lightwell is Distinguished by Inc. Magazine as one of the Fastest-Growing Private Companies in the U.S.
thread.title_full: Lightwell is Distinguished by Inc. Magazine as one of the Fastest-Growing Private Companies in the U.S.

author: Lori Angalich
title: Lightwell is Distinguished by Inc. Magazine as one of the Fastest-Growing Private Companies in the U.S.
text:
Inc. magazine has, for the sixth year, included Lightwell on its Inc. 5000 list of fastest-growing companies. The 2015 list is the publication’s 34th annual ranking of companies on the rise, and represents the most comprehensive look at the most important segment of the economy—America’s independent entrepreneurs. Businesses such as Yelp, Pandora, Timberland, Dell, Domino’s Pizza, LinkedIn, Zillow, and many other well-known names have been members of the Inc. 5000. Lightwell, a provider of solutions and services for Ecommerce, order management, B2B integration, Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) , and supply chain management, also appears on the ranking subsets of fastest-growing IT Services companies and the fastest-growing companies in Ohio and the Columbus metropolitan area. Lightwell has continued to achieve exceptional year-over-year growth since its founding as Oxford Consulting Group in 1998. View the Lightwell video introduction to learn more.
“We’re proud of our success and for being recognized by Inc. magazine again this year,” said Michelle Kerr, president of Lightwell. “It’s truly a team win since we couldn’t grow at this rate in such a competitive space without committing to our clients, investing in our employees and collaborating with our technology partners.”
Lightwell achieved a three-year growth rate of 104 percent, while creating and fulfilling numerous technology jobs across North America and the United Kingdom, as well as establishing its new research and development division in Northern Ireland. The companies on this year’s Inc. 5000 list collectively created 647,000 jobs and generated $205 billion in aggregate revenue in the past three years.
"The story of this year’s Inc. 5000 is the story of great leadership. In an incredibly competitive business landscape, it takes something extraordinary to take your company to the top,” says Inc. President and Editor-In-Chief Eric Schurenberg. “You have to remember that the average company on the Inc. 5000 grew nearly six-fold since 2012. Business owners don’t achieve that kind of success by accident."
Complete results of the Inc. 5000 can be found on the Inc. 5000 website.
About Lightwell
Lightwell develops and implements technology solutions that answer critical business challenges. The company serves a wide array of businesses across North America and Western Europe that have a desire to more effectively interconnect and manage information for optimal business performance. Lightwell is an IBM Premier Business Partner and a NetSuite Solution Provider . Lightwell’s technology services and solutions enable cost reduction, increase customer satisfaction, and accelerate growth. Lightwell is headquartered in in Dublin, Ohio with two offices in the United Kingdom and satellite offices across North America.
